title: Fix Ready tab order visibility and export functionality

requirements.text: Investigate and fix why order number 5038CO2600743-001 with Ready status is not appearing in the Ready tab dashboard. Verify the order status filtering logic in the backend query and frontend ReadyTab component to ensure all orders with Ready status are correctly retrieved and displayed.

quotes: One order number 5038CO2600743-001 was marked ready but it's not being shown under the ready tab in dashboard.

acceptanceCriteria: Order 5038CO2600743-001 appears in the Ready tab when it has Ready status
All other orders with Ready status continue to display correctly
Backend query correctly filters and returns all Ready status orders
Frontend ReadyTab correctly renders all Ready orders from the query

requirements.text: Fix the JPEG export functionality in OrderTable and KarigarDetail components. Ensure the export process correctly generates JPEG files from order data without errors.

quotes: Failed to export JPEG's and pdf pls fix it.

acceptanceCriteria: JPEG export completes successfully without errors
Generated JPEG files contain correct order information
Export works from both OrderTable component and KarigarDetail page
Loading states and error messages display appropriately during export

requirements.text: Fix the PDF export functionality in OrderTable and KarigarDetail components. Ensure the export process correctly generates PDF files from order data, including design images when available, without errors.

quotes: Failed to export JPEG's and pdf pls fix it.

acceptanceCriteria: PDF export completes successfully without errors
Generated PDF files contain correct order information and design images
Export works from both OrderTable component and KarigarDetail page
PDF formatting displays order data clearly with proper grouping by design code

constraints: Do not modify the backend order data structure or existing status values
Preserve existing export utility functions in frontend/src/utils/exportUtils.ts
Maintain compatibility with current OrderTable component usage across all dashboard tabs
nonGoals: Redesigning the export UI or adding new export formats
Modifying order status workflow or mark-as-ready functionality
Changes to other dashboard tabs beyond fixing the Ready tab visibility issue
